name: rspcdv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: rspcimdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: rspcimdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))

-| diffsc(s0, c1)

-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wb(w1, w2))

comment: Restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
